summary: The module provides unit tests that verify the regridding functionality for MODFLOW 6 simulations, checking that structured and unstructured grids can be regridded correctly, that custom regrid methods are supported, and that the resulting simulations include all required packages and can execute successfully.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and compatibility of the groundwater modeling regrid feature across different grid configurations and custom methods, and confirm that regridded simulations meet package requirements and run without errors.
